income_messages:
From: m***************2@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-30 13:12:33
SUBJECT:   Hello Beloved,
  Hello Beloved,
Good day, I am Mrs. Sala Umar. I am married to Mr.Ahmed Umar of
blessed memories. He was working with the Kuwaiti Embassy in Spain for
nine years before he died in 2007. We have been married for 11
years.He died of a short illness and we had no children.
My late husband died of cancer and uterine fibroid problems. He
deposited a total of $ 14.7 million in the bank before his death. ,I
want this organization or individual to use this money honestly mostly
for charity and orphanages homes. I support the views and beliefs of
the holy book which emphasizes giving alms and Charity and it
encouraged me to take this bold step.
I made this decision because I have no children to rely on here and I
don't want my husband's funds to go in vain or for the bank to
confiscate his fund. I will give you the contact information of my
barrister Barr. Smith Phillip.
If you are interested, kindly get back to me with your Full
Name,Contact Address, and Direct Telephone Number. As soon as I
receive your details I will forward them to my Barrister to contact
you and give you more updates.please reach me on my  email address:
mrssalaumar111982@gmail.com
Thank you,
Mrs.Sala Umar   
From: m***************2@gmail.com
To: dm94004@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-02 08:36:15
SUBJECT: Re: Hello Beloved,
Thanks very much for accepting me and my proposal. I would like you to pls
send me the scan photocopy of your current identification to know who I am
dealing with, your home address and your cell phone number .  Hereafter I
will forward your details to my lawyer for claim Documents and also to the
bank .
However, I  would like you to use the money judiciously for charity work
and orphanages homes as planned. Let me know what you wish to know about
the lawyer and the bank.
Thanks for your understanding.
Mrs.S.Umar.
From: m***************2@gmail.com
To: dm94004@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-04 14:15:33
SUBJECT: Re: Hello Beloved,
I have forwarded your details to Barrister Smith Phillip and he will
contact you any time.
When he does that please kindly work with him for a successful claim.
Meanwhile, I have notified the bank as well.
Thanks
Mrs. Umar.
outbound_messages:
From: dm94004@l******s.email
To: m***************2@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-30 13:12:39
SUBJECT: Re:   Hello Beloved,
Hello Umar,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I am sorry to hear about the loss of your husband. It is very kind of you to want to use the money for charity and orphanages. Can you please provide more information about the bank and the account where the money is deposited? Also, can you tell me more about your barrister, Barr. Smith Phillip? I would like to know more before I provide my personal information.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Leo

conversations.subject: SUBJECT:   Hello Beloved,
conversations.body:
Hello Beloved,
Good day, I am Mrs. Sala Umar. I am married to Mr.Ahmed Umar of
blessed memories. He was working with the Kuwaiti Embassy in Spain for
nine years before he died in 2007. We have been married for 11
years.He died of a short illness and we had no children.

encouraged me to take this bold step.
I made this decision because I have no children to rely on here and I
don't want my husband's funds to go in vain or for the bank to

mrssalaumar111982@gmail.com
Thank you,
Mrs.Sala Umar
